inn1.comm: wide down the leg side, pacy delivery to begin with
fuller in length and outside the off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward and digs it out to third man
that had pace bounce but no direction! Morkel fired that one down leg, Sehwag tried to glance it down but the ball managed to beat the diving Boucher
Morkel gets his direction right, on the stumps, Sehwag nudges it to the on side for a single
good length on leg stump, Jayasuriya places it with soft hands to the on side for a quick single
full, wide and Jayasuriya has a wild swish at it, lucky not to get an edge
wide again but the length is closer to off stump, Jayasuriya swings and misses
oh dear! Morkel fires it in with the same frightening pace but the ball goes so wide down the leg side that Boucher can't even reach it
Morkel bowls round the wicket this time, closer to off stump, Jayasuriya lets it to to the keeper
cracker of a straight drive by Sehwag, overpitched on off stump, he just leant onto it and pushed it past mid off
big stride forward, inside edge onto his pads and the ball trickles away towards fine leg
good length on off stump and shaping away, defended on the front foot to the off side
similar length, Sehwag gets another good stride forward and defends to the off side
good length outside off and shaping away, Sehwag shoulders arms
Odoyo lands that closer to the body, Sehwag shapes to play on the on side but the ball hits him high on the thigh pad, decides against a single
resumes from round the wicket, defended to the off side on the front foot
drifting towards the pads, Jayasuriya moves across and works it gently to the on side
Morkel runs in.. stops short, goes back to his mark, runs in again, Sehwag just taps it towards gully
good length, on the pads, Sehwag gets in position to work it across to the on side but gets struck on the thigh pad again
holds the pace back a little, opportunity to cut outside off stump, Sehwag has a gentle swish but misses
left alone outside off stump, good comeback by Morkel after his expensive first over
short of a good length on middle, Jayasuriya deftly turns his wrists and works it to fine leg
short, wide outside off, Sehwag cuts hard and the ball goes like lightening to third man who does well to get his hands to it
superb timing, just a hint of width outside off, Jayasuriya just cuts it off the meat of the bat and the ball beats point, effortless
pitches up outside off, Jayasuriya sees a bit of width, swings and misses
left alone to the keeper
good length outside off, shaping away, Jayasuriya places it towards cover
pacy delivery on the pads, Morkel makes Sehwag hop, Sehwag plays with soft bottom hand and steers it behind square
oversteps, Jayasuriya plays it with soft hands to the off side
overpitched outside off, Jayasuriya gets forward and pushes it firmly past the diving mid-off who's fielding close
drifting towards the pads, nudged to the on side
overpitched again, more width, but this time Jayasuriya doesnt move his feet and drives it straight to mid off
outside edge, past where second slip would've been, the ball races away to the third man fence
pitched up outside the off stump, inviting the drive, Jayasuriya drives on the up and the ball goes low to de Villiers at point who makes it look so easy
plenty of width outside off and Sehwag gets a stride forward and spanks it past the covers in the air
holds the length back a little, closer to the body, defended
bit of extra bounce, Sehwag tried a wild upper cut but the ball just managed to beat the bat
take that! just a bit of away swing, Sehwag gets forward and creams that past point
drifting down the leg side, Sehwag tries to nudge it down to fine leg, ball clips the pad, stifled appeal follows
fine leg is up, drifts on the pads and Sehwag glances it past a diving short fine leg
down leg again, Morkel thuds it in the direction of the rib cage, Ganguly tries to swerve out the way but the ball beats Boucher again
sweet timing, full on off stump, Ganguly leans onto it, places it perfectly between mid off and cover
short of a length, Ganguly gets back and tries to fend it to point, the ball gets the outside edge off his glove and races past the vacant second slip region
slipping down leg again, Morkel struggling with his line
slower ball good variation, Ganguly misses it outside off , Boucher fails to gather it on the first bounce and the ball goes past the slips, Boucher having a bit of nightmare so far
full outside off and driven past point, third man who is square runs across and cuts it down to 2 runs
loosener outside off stumpm, steered off the front foot to third man
width offered outside off, Sehwag shapes for an expansive drive, mistimes it and the ball rolls to the off side
outside off and driven off the front foot, third man does the fielding
slower ball on middle, Ganguly gets forward and pushes it to the off side
timing and placement! short of a length outside off, Ganguly just nonchalantly sticks his bat out, the ball bisects the gap between point and cover and races away
pushed to the off side
thudded in short of a length outside off, Sehwag has a feel for it but the ball beats him
length closer to off stump, Sehwag gets bat on it and defends
punched handsomely, but....straight to cover
extra bounce outside off and Sehwag manages to play the upper cut over the slips, controlled stroke in the end
Albie Morkel overpitches and Sehwag is quick to pounce on that drive that past the covers, sweet timing too
brilliant straight drive, good length on off stump, Ganguly gets forward and just a gentle front foot push screams past the left of mid-off
good length on middle, turned to the on side
good length on off stump, pushed to the packed off side region
good length outside off stump, pushed to point
slower ball, Ganguly shapes to hit it over the infield, misses, Boucher fails to gather it on the first bounce, the ball slips and and the pair steal a bye
driven straight to mid-off
the other Morkel - Albie - slips down leg, Ganguly just lets it go
what was that! Ganguly givess the charge, Morkel sees him thuds it in short, and the ball flies past Ganguly who can only watch it go
good length on off stump, defended to mid-off
bit of width outside off, Ganguly cuts it away down to third man who is square
drifting on the body, Sehwag tries to nudge it down to fine leg but the ball clips his body and rolls to the on side
on the body again, the ball rolls to the on side and and easy single taken
pitched up outside off, Sehwag gets forward and carts that over the infield on the off side
slam bang! overpitched outside off again, this time Sehwag scoops it up over the extra cover fence, the fielder had no chance
left alone to the keeper, good comeback by Chigumbura
bit of width outside off, inviting the cut, Sehwag drives on the frontfoot to point
width again, this time Sehwag waits on it and carves it down towards third man
turned away to the on side
Morkel drifts towards the pads, Ganguly nudges it down for an easy single
much better line, coming in after pitching on a good length, cramping him for room, Sehwag defends back to the bowler
left alone to Boucher
short of a length on middle, Sehwag hops and turns it softly to the on side and takes off
cracker! full and swinging away, Ganguly gives himself room and caresses the ball in the air past the packed off side field

full and slightly loopy that time, Sehwag's eyes light up and he goes for the expansive drive over cover, front foot comes out but not in the direction of the ball and his balance is all over the place, thick inside edge deflects onto the stumps, Sehwag falls in the 40s. Chigumbura strikes
That's a super start, full and outside off, Jayawardene is all elegance as he caresses it past point. Fine save at the boundary by Albie Morkel to keep them to three
outside off and he shoulders arms at that one
crisp cover-drive again, right off the meat of the bat, full and outside off but straight to the cover fielder
that's struck with a touch of the emphatic, short, not that pacy from Chigumbura and Jayawardene rocks back and pulls it majestically towards square for a one-bounce four
full and outside off, driven sweetly again but straight to the fielder. This man is in such goregous touch, you can watch him all day long
full and on the pads, tucked away to the square leg fielder
short and that's 140kph from Albie Morkel, pitched outside leg and angling it at the left-hander, Ganguly ducks under it
short again, directed at the rib-cage, Ganguly gets back on the back foot and cautiously pats it back down the ground
backs away and tries to slap it through the off side but Albie reads it well, slows down the pace and deceives Ganguly, can't get bat to that one
another slower ball and short of a length, Ganguly watches it carefully and defends it down the ground
short and just a tad outside leg, probably too high as well and it's called a wide, Albie not happy
short again, down leg and Ganguly was expecting that, moves across and helps it across past the wicketkeeper, top edge that flies away for four to fine-leg. Time for drinks
good return to the attack, short of a length and outside off, Jayawardene pokes tentatively and is beaten
slightly wider outside off, Jayawardene has nothing to do with it
good length ball, moving in from off to middle, he gets onto the front foot and tucks it to the leg side, straight to the square fielder, though
slap, that's typical Jayawardene, too full and too straight and he gets to the pitch of the ball and silks it through the covers for another gorgeous four
that's a good reply from Morne, short of a length and bouncing, troubling Jayawardene outside off
defended off the back foot watchfully, good line then
tipped to the off side for a quick single
short at 137kph, Jayawardene goes for the pull but can't get hold of it, top-edge balloons over square leg and they complete a couple
straight and short of a length, Jayawardene defends it back to the bowler
short again, Jayawardene pulls again, he's decided to go for these today, again not that well timed, gets the toe of the bat and picks up another couple
slower this time, fullish length, Ganguly shuffles across and pats it to mid-on for a quick single
full and straight, good variation in pace here, this was slightly quicker, patted back down the ground to mid-on

bowled 'em, cramped for room and tries something cute, ends up looking silly, short of a length on and outside off, tries to glide it to third man, thick inside edge deviates onto middle stump, Morkel strikes and Asia being pegged back a bit
good ball to get first up, short of a length and bouncing disconcertingly, Yousuf prods but is beaten for pace
full and outside off, driven off the middle of the bat, straight to cover
sliding down leg that time, clipped away to square leg, Tikolo fumbles but they decide against the single
outside off, Jayawardene has been leaving those alone
that's a cracker, full and outside off, allows Mahela a chance to free his arms and he creams it effortlessly through cover for a four
full and straight, Yousuf moves across and drives but it's straight to mid-on
tapped to the leg side, straight to the fielder again
full and on the pads, you can't do that at Odoyo's pace, Yousuf clips it in the gap but can't get the timing right, has to settle for three
blocked off the front foot, Jayawardene keeping the good ones out but going after the loose deliveries
full and outside off, laced through the covers but Tikolo pulls off a fine save in the off-side cordon, that was racing away to the boundary
gives him the charge but the ball moves away after pitching and beats him, Jayawardene getting a bit anxious now
glided to short third man for a single, gully needs to come around to stop that
driven to mid-on, crisp stroke, not much placement
good length outside off, defended to the off side watchfully
drifting down leg, that's a mistake, Jayawardene picks it off like picking apples off a tree, races away to fine leg for a four
short of a length and straight, that's a better line, Jayawardene keeps it out to the leg side
driven to point, had the room but didn't go ahead with the shot, straight to the fielder
good length outside off, Yousuf pats it to the off side, getting into his stride it seems
good probing delivery that, pitching on off and jagging into the right hander, Yousuf needs to watch it till the last moment to keep it out
straight again, maintaining it around the 122kph mark, defended to the off side
slightly short of a length and outside off, driven to point but no run again
turned away to the leg side for an easy single
angles his bat and runs it down to third man, easy single
full toss to start with and Jayawardene latches on, driving it through mid-on for a single
defended down the ground
nudged to short fine leg, no run possible
straighter one and Yousf plays for the turn, tries to drive through mid-on but gets a thick leading edge to point
too short that time, Yousuf just needs to rock back and clatter it past point for a four
slightlys short again, patted down the ground back to the bowler
down the ground to long-off for a single
straight and full, clipped to the leg side but no run
beaten that time, well bowled from Odoyo, short of a length and extracting some bounce, Yousuf tries to cut but is beaten by the bounce
back-cut behind square for an easy single, easily done
straighter and that's a better length too, back of a length and cramping Jayawardene for room, driven off the back foot to mid-off
short and slightly wide again, Jayawardene glides it to third man, gets a thick edge and manages a single
tossed up, outside off, not that much spin, Yousuf taps it to the off side for a quick single
cutely done, classic Jayawardene, outside off and he moves away and late-cuts it with a touch of panache, races away to third man for a four
driven down the ground for a single, sensible cricket here
pushed to long-on, these are easy pickings
pitching outside off, turning in, Mahela moves across and whips it to the leg side for a single
good length ball, defended back to the bowler
defended confidently to the off side, full ball
short and a bit wide, that's cleverly played, ramps it to third man for another four, just angles his bat and gets the result
defended to cover, straight to the fielder
defended off the back foot
clipped between midwicket and mid-on gorgeously for a crackling four, super timing, fine placement, not that good an idea to bowl on the pads to a player of Mahela's class
tossed up on middle and leg, driven to short midwicket
easy pickings for Yousuf, pushed to long-on for a single
pitching on middle and spinning to leg, Jaywardene tries to flick it fine but misses and that was close to leg stump, Boucher fumbles too
chipped over short midwicket for a single, scooped almost
pushed down the ground for a single
swivel pull to square leg and Morne Morkel lets that through his legs there, that was quite sloppy, they manage two
tapped to the off side
driven wonderfully down the ground but stopped well, that was heading straight to the fence
angled away behind square on the off side for a single
outside off, glided away to third man for a single
outside and short of a good length, Yousuf lunges and glides it to third man for a single
driven down the ground to mid-on for another single
full and tossed up, clipped away to the leg side
reverse-paddle comes out, it's full and he places it in the vacant third man region
conventional sweep this time, behind square for another single
quickly on the front foot and jabs it to short midwicket, straight to the fielder
gets the gap this time, down the ground to mid-on for a single
angled down to third man for a single
full and straight, driven to extra-cover for a single
short and wide outside off, turned away to third man for a single, he's playing that confidently
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
cut away to the sweeper on the square fence for a single
worked away towards midwicket, no room for a single
again worked away just wide of the fielder at midwicket, this time they go for the single, had to rush a bit but it was a well judged single
clipped away off the pads to fine leg, easy single and that's his fifty
tucked away off the back-foot to the third man region, yet another easy single added to the total
flat delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene comes well forward and works it away through square leg
punched straight back down the track to long-on
full and drifting down the leg side, Yousuf fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad, appeal for lbw turned down - a blind man could have picked that it was going to miss leg
wayward delivery outside the off stump
worked away well wide of the fielder at mid-on
again eased away on the leg side
tucked away through square leg for an easy single

take that! fuller in length and close to the off stump line, Jayawardene gets well forward to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it straight down the ground and the ball sails over the long-on fence. For a second it looked like the shot was not timed well enough but Jayawardene got enough bat on it
driven away on the off side
turned away in the air to the midwicket region, diving effort ends in vain
lofted down to wide long-on, another close chance
six more! on the middle and off stump line, Yousuf dances down the track, gets well inside the line and lofts it over Morkel at deep midwicket.
defended watchfully
reverse sweep and that's 8000 ODI runs fro Yousuf - what a player
worked away with the angle to the midwicket region
cut away late to the third man region
width offered outside the off stump and Jayawardene cuts late
turned away off the back-foot to the square leg region
wicket to wicket delivery, Jayawardene goes right back and tucks it away towards square leg, no room for a single there
chops it down to third man
turned away with the spin to midwicket
slightly short, Yousuf stands tall on the back foot and punches it down to long-on for an easy single
half sweep and there is that single
driven down to long-on

tossed up and turning in, Jayawardene comes down the track and swings hard, not a well timed shot and the ball just balloons up towards silly mid-off. Pollock calls for it and settles under it, for a second it looked like he was not in control but in the end it was a decent take. Boucher tried his best to distract Pollock so did Tikolo but...
dirven off the bak-foot
defended watchfully
short of a good length delivery, again watchfully played
cut away off the back-foot for a single
short of a good length delivery, bit of width offered and Yousuf runs it down to third man
good lenght delivery, angled accross the left-hander. Yuvraj gets a good stride in and punches it straight down the track to the mid-off region and a diving stop there cuts off a certain boundary
turned away off the back-foot, easy single to end the over
full and on the pads, driven down to long-on for a single
short and wide outside the off stump, Yousuf goes back and across, waits for the ball to turn and then cuts it through point, diving effort in the deep ends in vain
defended on the back-foot
flat and bit outside the off stump, Yousuf stretches well forward, goes low down and tucks it away behind square leg for an easy single
forced away for a single
turned away off the pads to the square leg region, easy single take Yousuf to his fifty.

good length delivery, close to the off stump line - Yousuf gets well forward and drives it past the diving fielder at point, opened the face of the bat at the point of impact to get the placement right
short of a good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and Yuvraj punches it down to long-off for a single
steered away off the back-foot to the third man region
driven hard and straight, bit too straight one should say - ball crashes into the stumps at the other end

short of a good length delivery, Yuvraj defends it down on the off side and they take off for a quick single, Chigumbura moves across quickly in an effort to cut it off but only manages to run into Yousuf - no damage done
defended on the back-foot
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, defended down on the leg side
short and drifting down the leg side, Yuvraj stays back and pulls it down to fine leg
off-cutter, bowled from wide of the crease. Yousuf stays back and taps it away towards point
line and length delivery, defended on the back-foot
on the pads and Yuvraj flicks it down to fine leg for yet another easy single
short of a good length and drifting down the leg side, Yousuf stays back and pulls it down to fine leg
short of a good length delivery, coming in with the angle - Yousuf stays back and taps it down on the off side, played with soft hands and they scamper through for an easy single

fuller length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Yuvraj steps forward in an attempt to lofts it away through midwicket but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls away off the inner half of the bat to the deep backward square leg region
this time he gets it right. steps forward, lines it up nicely and drills the ball through the gap between mid-on and midwicket
four more, better line and length, opens up Yuvraj and the edge is produced but the ball races away to the third man fence
punched down to long-on
turned away well in front of square leg
pitched up outside the off stump and Yousuf drills it through point, there is protection in the deep
good length delivery, cutting in from wide outside the off stump. Yousuf stays back and glides it down to third man for a single
surprise bouncer and Yuvraj had no option but to duck under it. Well bowled
lucky is the name of the shot. short of a good length delivery outside the off stump - Yuvraj goes for the pull, ball clips the outside edge and flies over the keeper
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
low fulltoss and Yuvraj lofts it down to long-on, falls just short of the fielder moving in from the deep
pitched up outside the off stump and Yousuf drives it through the gap between mid-off and cover
driven straight to the fielder at backward point
in the channel outside the off stump, Yousuf drives off the front-foot, ball clips the innner half of the bat and goes straight back to the bowler
short of a good length delivery, Yousuf waits for the ball and cuts it down to third man
clipped away off the pads to the wide long-on region, agian just a single
slower delivery, Yousuf picks it up early and drives it away through midwicket
yorker length delivery outside the off stump, Yuvraj pushes forward and forces it away towards cover point
short and wide outside the off stump, Yuvraj back away and cuts it through cover point
pitched up outside the off stump and Yousuf drills it through backward point. Opened the face of the bat at the last possible moment to get it past the fielder there
anti-climax! slower delivery on the pads and Yousuf clips it straight to de Villiers at midwicket - soft dismissal
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, flick of the wrists and Dhoni gets it past the fielder at midwicket
pitched up outside the off stump, Yuvraj steps forward and drives it through cover
short rising delivery on the stumps, bit of a surprise delivery and Dhoni defends it down awkwardly
bowled from round the stumps and coming in with the angle, Yuvraj stays back and defends it straight back to the bowler
another tight delivery and Yuvraj is made to defend - good start to the over
and gone! good length delivery outside the off stump, Yuvraj stands tall and drives it straight to the fielder at cover - another soft dismissal, Asia XI six down
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and Harbhajan is beaten all ends up - excellent delivery first up
short of a good length delivery, worked away off the back-foot to the fine leg region
143 kmph - in the channel outside the off stum - short and rising, Dhoni watcfully leaves it through to the keeper. End of a fantastic over
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended
clipped away off the pads to the midwicket region
good length delivery outside the off stump, punched off the front-foot to the cover region

short of a good length delivery and Harbhajan defends it down on the leg side, quick single called for but Harbhajan was not interested and Dhoni had to rush back. Fairly wide throw comes in, Odoyo dives across full length but fails to collect the ball cleanly but the ball ricochets on to the stumps and that's the end of Dhoni
defended on the back
worked away on the leg side
forced away off the back-foot to the mid-off region
good length delivery outside the off stump and Mortaza finds the fielder at cover
turned away off the back-foot to the midwicket region

short and drifting down the leg side, Harbhajan has a waft at it and the ball goes through to the keeper, hard to say if there was some glove involved anyway the umpire is not interested and the appeal is turned down
defended
turned away well in front of square leg
wayward delivery down the leg side
forced away off the bacck-foot to the cover region, Harbhajan is all at sea here
frustration! comes down the track and has a go at a short of a good length delivery but fails to connect, ball rolls away off the thigh pad
slogged away towards deep midwicket and Bosman somehow manages to drop a sitter. What a mess
defended down on the off side and they scamper through for a single, Odoyo moves across quickly but fails to his the stumps at the bowler's end. Direct hit and Mortaza would have been history
punched down the ground, just a single
short of a good length delivery, Singh stands tall on the back-foot and taps it down to third man
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Harbhajan has a poke at it and the ball sails through to the keeper, beaten for pace there
bang! another short of a good length delivery and this time Harbhajan just dismisses it over the midwicket fence. Middled it to perfection and the ball just kept sailing
worked away for an easy single
driven straight back and the ball rolls away off the stumps at the other end
attempted yorker, lands right in the slot and Harbhajan hammers it straight back past the bowler and his diving brother at mid-off
makes room and gets it past the fielder at cover, 300 comes up - with just three more overs to go - how many can they add?
short delivery outside the off stump, Harbhajan comes down the track and chops it away to the deep cover region
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
Mortaza too has a wild swing at a short of a good length delivery, ball clips the outside edge and flies away towards deep point
short rising delivery, coming in with the angle - Mortaza makes room as swats at it but fails to make contact
yorker outside the off stump and once again Moratza is beaten  -  well bowled
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Mortaza makes room and slices it away to deep third man
fulltoss and Harbhajan hits it straight down the throat of Pollock at long-on. Afro-Asian friendship at its best
short rising delivery on the stumps and Zaheer was clueless
slower delivery outside the off stump, Khan drives away from his body and the ball flies off the outside edge to the third man region
well disguised slower delivery and Mortaza is beaten outside the off stump
edged away behind square on the leg side
tight delivery to end the over and Khan fails to get it past the bowler
yorker, slight off target and the ball zips past the off stump
pitched up on the middle and leg stump line, Mortaza makes room and drives inside out to deep extra cover
slower delivery, Mortaza swings across the line, ball clips the inside edge and rolls away behind square on the leg side
short and wide outside the off stump, Khan goes right back and chops it away to the backward point fence, clean hit
fulltoss on the stumps and Khan finds de Villiers at midwicket
slower delivery, Mortaza swings across and the ball spoons up off the top edge, de Villiers calls for it and comfortably settles under it at midwicket

inn2.comm: Two slips waiting and he sends this one on the legs. de Villiers gets in line and flicks it away. Four runs. Easy.

What a jaffa! Asif has cleaned him up. The perfect nip-backer. It landed on a length, just outside the off stump and de Villiers chose to leave it. To his dismay, the ball darted back in and crashed into the off stump. Asif has exacted his retribution for the previous boundary. de Villiers showed poor judgement there, playing for the outswinger
Nearly on the same spot but this one goes away and Dippenaar lets this one go past him. Luckily, this one doesn't come back in.
fullish, on the off stump line, Dippenaar gets behind the line, pats it gently to the off side.
fuller, around the off stump and once again Dippenaar moves towards the line, pushes it to the off side
starts on target: on the off stump, full in length and pushed towards mid off
even better this time. Fuller, around the off stump, sucking Botsman forward and he has a lame poke at it, late in coming forward, and gets an outside edge down to third man
similar length but the line was on the middle and leg, Dippenaar loses his balance a touch while trying to flick and hence doesn't get the placement right. it goes straight to midwicket
shifts his line to the off and middle and Dippenaar drives towards mid off
full-pitched, outside off stump, streaky edge down to third man
nagging line on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover
pulled away. Banged in short, outside the off stump but Dippenaar takes care to go back and across, close to the line and pulls over midwicket
change of action. Suddenly the right arm went farther to the right than usual and he hurled in a full and straight one outside off stump, left alone
overpitched outside the off stump and Dippenaar leans forward and caresses it through cover region
drags back the length. In the corridor outside the off stump and Dippenaar covers the off stump and shoulders arms

almost dragged on. Short of length, just outside the off stump and holding its line, Dippenaar tries to punch it away off the back foot, the bat comes outside the line and gets an inside edge past the stumps
full in length, outside the off stump and cautiously defended off the front foot

It's Dippenaar's time to hear the death-knell. It landed on a length, on the middle and off line and moved towards off stump. Dippenaar pushed at it, anticipating more movement away than what occured, the bat went outside the line and the off stump was pegged back. Loose defensive prod.
kicks up from short of length, on the off stump and Tikolo is surprised at the extra bit of bounce. He fends at it ungainly.
beaten Fullish, going on with the angle and Tikolo ends up playing inside the line

Throat-ball. This is a lovely pitch. Another one that rears up from short of length, Tikolo stabs at it, gets a top-edge and it balloons up but falls short of the slips. The New Zealand curators who did lot of work on this track would be really thrilled.
lands on a length, outside the off stump, comes back in a touch and pushed down the wicket
In the zone outside the off stump and Tikolo lets it rush past him
fuller, on the middle line and it shapes back in, Tikolo tries to tickle it away, misses and it thuds into high on the pad

Dropped by Tharanga at third slip. Full-pitched, outside the off stump and Tikolo has a flash. It flew off the outside edge, straight at the face of Tharanga but he couldn't hold on to it. That travelled in some speed.
full again, outside the off stump, deflected towards point
full and on the middle line, defended on the front foot
on the length, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
on the line, around the off stump line, pushed to cover
hurls in a bouncer, outside the off stump, left alone

After the bouncer comes the fullish one outside the off stump. Bosman, still hanging on the back foot after that short-pitched stuff, has a loose drive and is snaffled up in the first slip. It was the bouncer which led to this dismissal.
another edge but this time it doesn't carry to the slips. It was full in length and outside the off stump, Tikolo is late in coming forward, tries to drive, gets a bottom-edge, to second slip
gets forward and punches it through the covers
kicks up from short of length, around the off stump, Tikolo stabs at it and gets a outside edge to the off side
short of length, outside the off stump, moves back and across, steers to point
in the channel outside the off stump and Tikolo goes out in search of the delivery but doesn't hang out the bat. That saved him from getting a outside edge.
on the stumps and Tikolo gets right behind the line to defend
bangs it short of length, just below chest-high and Kemp gets on top of the bounce and defends it in front of him
fuller this time, on the off stump line, Kemp leans forward, pushes it to cover
another one that climbs up from short of length, Kemp again stands up tall, keeps  it out
on the off and middle line, defended on the front foot
Kemp break free with a straight drive. He leant forward to a full-pitched delivery outside the off stump and drove it crisply down the ground.
corrects the length, on the off stump line, pushed at it, gets a outside edge, runs to backward point
fuller, outside the off stump, left alone
goes to the wide of the crease and sends in a full one on the off stump line, pushed to cover
nagging line on the off stump line, stabbed away to point
lands on a length, outside the off stump, holds its line, Kemp guides it down to third man

hitwicket!  Bizaare. Tikolo goes back to a short of length delivery and pushes it out to the off side. But alas, he drags his front leg, yes front and not back, on to the leg stump. That's strange. Usually, one goes back and ends up sliding the back leg fatally but this time he stopped himself and then the front leg went back. Gone.

fullish, outside the off stump, Boucher stands there, without moving the feet, and drives to right of cover where Harbhajan Singh dives to make a half-stop. Asif is impressed with the effort and applauds.
on the legs, flicked away behind square-leg
fullish, on the off stump line and driven to mid-off
on the off stump line, on a length, Boucher tries to force it away but the bat goes outside the line
on the middle line, Boucher hops back, gets behind the line, deflects to midwicket
angled away from Boucher who goes back and across, covers the off stump and watches it sail into Dhoni's gloves

Africans are tottering under the lights. It was full in length, outside the off stump, Kemp is late in getting forward, has a poke at it and the ball kept low and it gets the inside edge and goes on to the stumps. Nice move by Jayawardene to continue with Asif
on the middle line, shapes in touch, defended to the on side
Wow. Classic cover drive. Classy. Full-pitched outside the off stump and he struck it cleanly, all timing and minimum of  effort. Lovely swing of the bat.
full and just outside the off stump, Pollock is quick to get forward and offers the full face of the bat in defence
outside the off stump and moves away, Pollock shapes to cut but doesn't make any contact
it landed just outside the off stump, and keeps a tad low, Boucher is touch surprised by it and crouches to keep it away
on the middle line, moves in, tickled to the on side
fullish, outside the off stump and Pollock drives uppishly but in the gap between the bowler and mid-off
Slogged away. Short of length, on the off stump line and Pollock takes the left leg out of the line and heaves it over mid on
full and straight, on the off and middle, turned to the on side for a single
in the channel outside the off stump, goes on straight, left alone
banged in short and Pollock opts for a pull but gets a top-edge down to fine leg
on the middle and leg line, turned to square leg. Tharanga fires in a direct hit and the non-striker's end but Pollock is inside the crease

lemon cut. French cut. Fullish, outside the off stump line, Boucher is late in shifting his balance on to the front foot, drives loosely and gets a inside-edge past the stumps, down to fine-leg region
on the middle and leg line, worked to the on side
On the off stump line, on the off stump, pushed to Yuvraj Singh at backward point
on the off stump line, short of length, Pollock gave him self some room and forces it through cover point. He is on the attack here.
slips down the leg side. Wide called.
Short of length and again Pollock forces it off the back foot and Harbhajan dives to his right at cover to make a good stop. Tonight Harbhajan has morphed into Jonty Rhodes.
almost cleaned up. Full and straight, on the middle and Pollock took his left leg outside the line and had a wild swing across the line but misses it completely and the ball whizzes over the bails
beaten. In the corridor outside the off stump, on a length, and holds its line, Pollock ends up pushing inside the line

Almost holed up to mid on. Banged in short, around the off stump and Boucher goes for a pull shot, gets a top edge and it balloons towards mid on but Yousuf is bit late in reacting to it - must have lost it in the lights- and can't reach it
another pull, again not cleanly timed but this crosses the thirty-yard circle in the midwicket region
fuller this time and Boucher is quick to get on the front foot to flick it away through the midwicket region
slightly short in length and another mis-timed pull shot sees the ball go past square leg
goes round the stump, homes in on the off stump, defended to the off side. Drinks break.
lands on the middle and leg and spins down leg side
turns in from outside off stump, flicked behind square-leg
again spins in from outside the off stump, Pollock tries to tickle it to leg side and is rapped on the pad
slightly short in length, spins in from outside off stump and Pollock pulls it away to midwicket region
faster, on the leg and middle line, tries to paddle away and runs down to fine-leg region
turns in from outside the off stump, Pollock tries to flick and again is hit on the pads
bowled from round the stumps and coming in with the angle, Boucher stays back and punches it down to silly mid-off
defended straight back down the track, Jayasuriya moves across to his right and cuts it off
off the pad and the ball rolls away towards the vacant point region, easy single
pushes forward to defend and the ball thuds into the pad, half hearted appeal for lbw turned down
turned away with the spin to the square leg region
slightly short, Boucher goes right back and taps it away on the leg side, end of a decent first over from Jayasuriya
worked away with the spin to the midwicket region
short ball, on the middle and off stump line - Pollock back away and punches it down to long-on

what a shot! tossed up outside the off stump, Boucher gets right behind the line and clips it away through midwicket, lot of bottom hand coming in to play there, sweetly timed and the ball just raced away to the fence
worked away on the leg side
turning in and Pollock gets hit on the pad, half hearted appeal turned down
flicked away off the pads to the square leg region, Jayasuriya moves accross quickly and cuts off the single
gone! bowled from round the stumps and this one just skids on, Boucher playing for turn gets nowhere near the line and the ball crashes into the leg stump. Six down - just four more to go
defended back to the bowler
quicker delivery, Morkel stays back and looks to flick but fails to make contact
defended outside the off stump
hit outside the line of off stump and the lbw appeal is turned down
short and wide outside the off stump, cut away off the back-foot to the third man region
driven wide of the fielder at cover
tossed up outside the off stump, in the slot, Morkel stretches forward to the pitch of the delivery and drives it past the fielder at cover
punched away off the back-foot to the cover region, fantastic diving stop by Yuvraj at cover saves runs
forced away on the off side
bit of extra bounce and Morkel ends up with a thick edge, ball flies over Jayawardene at slip
driven down to long-off, easy single to end the over

Gotcha!  Done in by the extra bounce. Spins in from outside off stump and kicks up. Albie shapes to cut but is surprised by the extra bounce and gets a top-edge and it thuds into Dhoni's arm and then runs on to the shoulder and pops up and Dhoni grabs it on the second attempt.
full and on the middle stump line, driven back to the bowler
outside off stump, full in length, driven to deep cover
outside the off stump, slides on, Chigumbura tries to cut and gets a outside edge which takes the ball to third man boundary
turns in from outside off stump, and raps him on the pad
slightly short of length outside off stump and again it turns in, cut past point
lands outside off stump, turns in, cut to Ganguly at wide third man
floated on the middle, deflected to midwicket

how did that miss the off stump? It landed outside the off stump and turned back in sharply. Chigumbura made room, tried to cut but is beaten by the extent of the spin and gets a inside edge past the stumps.
leans forward to defend.
on the middle line, driven back to the bowler
floated on the off stump line, driven to deep cover
quicker one gets him in trouble. Fires in one at yorker-length and the batsman is rapped on the pad.
floated outside off stump, defended on the front foot
flighed delivery, on the off stump, driven to long on
doosra, just outside the off stump and he gets a edge to third man region
tossed-up, outside the off stump, turns in and Pollock cuts through backward point
loopy delivery on the off and middle line, stabs at it, gets a inside edge to the fine-leg region
outside the off stump, full in length, driven to cover
retains the strike with a flick with the spin to long leg
floated outside off stump, Pollock leans forward, drives to sweeper cover
quicker one, lands on the leg and middle, goes on with the angle and raps him on the pad but just outside the leg stump
breaks free with a heave across the line. He came down the track, didn't reach the pitch and swung it just wide of Yousuf at mid on
tossed-up on the middle and slog-swept to deep midwicket
leans forward and offers full face of the bat in defense

Hello? The ball has been deposited into the third tier at long off pavilion. He waltzed down the track, reached the pitch this time and struck it cleanly. Up, up and over. Wonderful strike. Good clean swing of the bat.
hands the strike back to Chigumbura with a push to extra cover
leans forward to defend it down the track
on the middle and leg, deflected to the on side
quicker, on the middle stump line, worked to the on side.
almost yorks himself, trying to flick a fullish delivery to the on side
floated on the middle and Chigumbura swings it uppishly and again just over Yousuf outstretched right hand at mid on. Hmm...
Slogged away. Flighted delivery on the off stump line and Chigumbura takes out the front leg from the line and knives it between the bowler and mid on
on the middle stump line, driven to mid off
flighted delivery, almost at the blockhole and Chigumbura scoops it over midwicket. He  lost his balance in the process and fell on his backside
attempted yorker, drifts on to the pads, and they run a quick single
on the middle and leg, on a length, punched towards mid on for a single
bouncer but it sails well above the head. Wide called.
fuller this time, on the off and middle, driven back to the bowler. Mortaza makes the stop and stares at the batsman. The crowd roar.
banged in short, rises up chest-high, on the off and middle, defended to the off side
short of length, outside the off stump, guided to third man
short again, on the off and middle, pulled away
flighted delivery, fullish, Pollock tries to turn it across the line, gets a leading edge to the off side
tossed-up, on the middle and leg, swept away to long leg
leans forward, tries to drive, gets a inside-edge on to the pad
slightly short in length, outside the off stump, cut past point
on the middle line, punched to midwicket
Twhack. Slighty short in length, on the off and middle line and Pollock slaps it over midwicket .Wonderful pull shot.
corrects his length, hurls this one fuller, on the middle and leg and it nips back in to rap Pollock on the pad. Going down though.
outside the off stump, fullish, edged away to Yousuf at third man
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to deep cover
short of length, outside the off stump, cut down to third man region
on the middle and leg, on a length, Chigumbura stays back, tucks it behind square-leg
floated in from round the stumps, Pollock comes down the track, can't reach the pitch but adjusts to keep it away to the leg side
drifts in on the off stump line ,full in length, Pollock makes room, tries to cut but gets a edge down to third man region as the ball came in with the angle
outside the off stump, pushed to backward point
on the middle line, deflected to midwicket

Chigumbura holes out to long on. Floated in, almost at the blockhole, and Chigumbura takes out the front leg off the line and scoops it high in the air. It has to be said that it was a quite a well-timed scoop! It went all the way to long on where Yousuf was waiting for it.
short of length, on the off stump line, pulled away through mid on
overpitched outside the off stump and Pollock drives pleasingly through cover region
beaten. Kicks up from short of length and it bounces more than he expected. Pollock tries to cut but the ball bounces over the blade
brings up his fifty with a well-timed cut shot. He is playing purely as a batsman and is showing how capable he is with the bat.
And again. Again short of length, around the off stump and Pollock cuts it. Not much power but pure timing.
three in succession. But this one was streaky. Fuller in length, just outside the off stump and Pollock drives and gets a inside-edge past the off stump
on the off stump line, pushed to point
on the leg and middle, Pollock tries to sweep and misses
The white ball is flying everywhere. He charged down the track and hits it cleanly over long on.
on the legstump and he sweeps it away. Pollock is the lone warrior here.
spins in from outside the off stump, pushed down the track
on the middle and leg, turned to the on side
spins in from outside the off stump, defended on the front foot
on the middle and leg, flicked behind square leg
on the middle and leg, driven to long on
turns in from outside off stump, cut to point
quicker, on the off stump line, driven to long off
Dropped by Dhoni. Tough chance. Slided in from outside the off stump, tries to push it to the off side, gets a outside edge and it bounds off Dhoni's gloves

flicked away to deep square-leg and they try to come back for two. The throw comes in at the non-striker's end. Jayasuriya reaches out, grabs the ball and flicks it on to the stumps. Odoyo drags his bat just in time. It was refered upstairs and after numerous replays it was adjudged not out
full and outside off, driven to long off
floated in from round the stumps, driven to long off for a single
spins in from outside the off stump, turned to midwicket region
fuller, on the off and middle, driven back to the bowler
on the middle this time and Pollock leans forward to drive to long off
drifts in on the off stump, driven to long off
flighted delivery, on the off stump line, driven to cover
slightly short of length, on the middle stump line, Odoyo pulls it over midwicket
again he changes his action. Right arm goes farther than usual and the result is a overpitched delivery outside off stump. Odoyo creams it down the ground
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to cover
bouncer at the leg and middle, ducks under
slower delivery, goes high over waist, on the off stump line and Odoyo waits before lapping it around the corner, past square leg
full and on the middle and leg, tries to flick it across, gets a leading edge to third man
slightly short in length, on the middle and leg, Pollock shapes to pull but is hurried by the ball and is rapped on the pad

Pollock backs away to the leg side, Khan pushes it well outside the off stump and Pollock hangs his bat out and it makes contact with the bottom-half of the bat and it falls just short of Yuvraj Singh at point
Zaheer goes round the stumps. On the middle and off and Pollock stnads there and slaps it down the track but Zaheer makes the half-stop
this one finds the gap. Short in length again, well outside the off stump and Pollock spanks it to the left of mid off

Pollock goes down town. Full-pitched on the off stump line and he drills it between the bowler and mid off. Suddenly the Asian eleven wake up. Mahela goes in consultation with Ganguly and Zaheer. Harbhajan joins in. There is a buzz around the arena
attempted yorker, on the middle and off, sliced away to cover
another one at the blockhole, dug out back to the bowler
Odoyo joins in the fun. He leans forward and knives through the line of a length delivery on the off stump and sends it high over mid off
beaten. Just short of driveable length and it bounces up, Odoyo has a stab and a miss
short in length, defended on the front foot.
on the off and middle, Odoyo leans forward to push it away to the off side
bouncer and Odoyo shapes to pull but is beaten by the extra bounce
backs away to the leg side, Asif follows him but Odoyo lofts it over mid on and Harbhajan Singh, running back, is unable to reach it
fullish outside the off stump, Pollock goes for a drive but can't connect
Bang. Again the front leg is taken out and the bat comes down rapidly and he swings a full-pitched delivery to deep midwicket
outside the off stump, driven to sweeper cover
wide down the leg side..
slower one, off cutter, on the leg side, dabbed to midwicket
moves to within six-runs short of the magic figure. It was full and outside off stump, Pollock gets a thick edge to thirdman boundary.
full, in the slot, outside off stump but Pollock drills it straight to sweeper cover. will retain the strike though. He is on 95.

Moves to 99, Delectable late cut. Short in length, kicks up outside the off stump and Pollock leans back, makes room and cuts it through to thrid man boundary. No one manning the third man boundary. The man is inside the circle.
Pollock is itching to get to the figure. Pats a length-delivery to the on side, sets off for a non-existent run, realises and gets back into the crease.
another length-delviery, around the off stump, steered to point. Again Pollock takes a step or two before realising the folly

That's it. He gets to his maiden ton. This is the first century in Afro Asia tournament as well. Congrats Pollock. Short of length, and outside off stump and Pollock stayed adjacent to the line and cut it through backward point. The helmet came off , the bat was held aloft ,  a huge grin spread across the visage, and the crowd roared in appreciation.
leans forward, pushes to extra cover for a single
fullish, on the middle line, driven to long on
slightly short in length, outside the off stump and Odoyo sprung back, made room and pulled it to deep midwicket. Stunning.
spins in and raps him on the thigh pad even as he tries to work it to on side
and again
outside the off stump, driven to sweeper cover
full and on the middle stump line, driven to long on
drifts in from round the stumps, slightly short of length, pulled to Yousuf at square leg
goes back to over the wickets. on the middle line, driven to long off
on the middle stump line, pushed through mid on
fires in one short of length, outside the off stump and Odoyo tries to cut but can't connect.
on the middle and leg, clipped past square leg for couple of runs.
Odoyo is playing a great supporting role out there. Tossed-up, on the middle stump line and he swings it over long on. Imperious. The required rate comes tumbling down.
on the off stump line, flicked past square leg

Odoyo falls. It was almost a six. Full and on the off stump and he swings it high towards deep midwicket region. Tharanga had one look at the rope, made sure he planted his foot just inside and waited for the ball to arrive. She sailed right into his palms. A thrilling cameo comes to an end. Only one wicket left. 61 from 40 balls.
almost in the block hole, driven past the bowler
beaten. Tossed up, on the off stump line and it breaks away. Morne has a wild swing and a miss. Pollock walks over for a chat.
And Morne responds to that talk with a perfect forward defense
And again. Now it's all up to Pollock. Can he do it?

fires in that one quick. Short of length, on the leg and middle and Pollock is hurried on to his pull shot and ends up playing it weakly to the square-leg region. Now Mahela moves in for a lengthy chat with Yuvraj
turns in from outside off, pushed to cover. Can Morne remain patient?
again he leans forward, taps the ball gently to the off side.
quicker and shorter, outside the off stump, swatted back to the bowler. Another dot ball.
Morne breaks free with a firm drive down the ground. Tossed-up, outside off and full in length, he leant forward to drill it past the bowler
It was driven to long on but Pollock doesn't want to take the single. He wants the strike.
attempted yorker, ends up as a low full-toss outside the off stump, Pollock reaches out, carves it straight to deep pont. Doesn't take the single.
And that's why. Fullish, on the off and middle and Pollock takes out the front leg and creams it right over the bowler's head. Whoosh.
He goes down town again but Harbhajan Singh makes a neat sliding stop at long off. Only one run.
swing and a miss. Another dot ball. It was a length-delivery that moved away from Morne
on the off stump line, from a length, Morne gets behind the line to defend to the off side
on the middle and leg, full in length, clipped away to square leg
ouch. Pollock backs away and Zaheer follows him with a short-pitched one. Pollock is cramped for room, tries to pull it away and is struck in the midriff
Full in length, outside the off stump, Pollock has a swing but can't connect
Third dot ball in a row. Short in length, on the middle line, Pollock pulls but straight to midwicket.
goes for a yorker, ends up as a low full-toss outside the off stump and Pollock reaches out and carves it behind point. Valuable runs.
full and on the legs, flicked away to deep square leg
on the off stump line, on a length and Morne preserves his wicket by defending it to on side. Over to you Shaun.
fullish, on the middle and leg, Pollock swings it to widish long on. Pollock runs the first run hard and comes back for the second. On strike. There is still hope for the African XI
Hope floats on. Full-pitched delivery on the stumps and Pollock leans forward and  lofts it to the wide long on region.
Slower one. Pollock is almost through with his shot, checks and pushes it back to the bowler
Inside edges to fine leg. Full and on the leg and middle, Pollock backs away, has a wild swing and gets a edge it to fine leg boundary.

Pollock is out, going for the jugular. Asian XI have won. It was slightly short in length, on the off stump line and Pollock shaped to pull it over midwicket. But it was a slower one from Mortaza  and he was early into the stroke and sent it straight to Yousuf at midwicket. It was a sensational innings from Pollock but he couldn't quite finish it off.
